item.title: TikTok / Instagram Video Creator - Upwork
item.description:
TrulyIslamic, a premier jewelry brand specializing in Islamic-themed pieces for both men and women, is seeking a talented video editor to create engaging, viral-worthy content to promote our beautiful jewelry. The role involves editing and producing high-quality videos that showcase TrulyIslamic jewelry, utilizing AI text-to-speech technology for narration, optimizing videos for social media platforms, incorporating feedback and revisions, and collaborating with our marketing team to align content with brand messaging. The ideal candidate will have proven experience in video editing, proficiency in software like Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro, familiarity with AI text-to-speech tools, a strong understanding of social media trends, and a creative mindset with an eye for detail. We will start with a trial period where you will create 3-4 videos, and based on the quality and performance of these, we will consider a long-term collaboration. We offer competitive compensation, a flexible remote work environment, and the chance to work with a passionate and creative team. To apply, submit your resume, portfolio, and a brief cover letter explaining your relevant experience and why you would be a good fit for this role. Include examples of previous work that demonstrate your ability to create engaging and viral video content. Join TrulyIslamic and help us spread the beauty and elegance of Islamic jewelry to the world through captivating videos!


Posted On: June 19, 2024 18:11 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, Instagram, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial
Skills: Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, Instagram, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Videographer for Interview Project - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled videographer to capture and produce high-quality footage for a brief interview project in Houston, TX. We will provide the interview questions and the interviewer will not be a part of the video. The job will only take a half day or less, and we're looking to schedule between 6/20 - 28.

The videographer will be responsible for setting up and operating equipment, framing shots, and ensuring the lighting and sound are optimal, and will read off the interview questions. The candidate ideally has experience in interview-style filming and must be proficient in using professional video cameras, lighting setups, and audio recording equipment.

There may also be some small video editing needed, depending on the availability of our in-house producer.

Hourly Range: $50.00-$60.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 18:08 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Video Production, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Videography, Video Production, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.description:

The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of the latest trends and techniques in social media video production. - Storytelling
- Creative thinking
- Familiarity with YouTube shorts, Instagram reels, and TikTok

item.title: Montage vidéo simple - Upwork
item.description:
Bonjour à tous,

Je suis à la recherche d'un monteur vidéo pour mes formations. J'ai filmé plusieurs vidéos de formation sur Loom, chacune durant entre 15 et 30 minutes. Pendant l'enregistrement, il m'arrive souvent de trébucher sur certains mots ou de répéter des phrases plusieurs fois.

Votre mission sera donc de télécharger ces vidéos, d'éliminer les répétitions et les erreurs, et de produire une version finale fluide. Aucun autre travail de montage n'est requis, uniquement ces coupures pour enlever les doublons et les erreurs de discours.

Je cherche une personne minutieuse et fiable pour effectuer ce travail, car il faut regarder la vidéo en entier. Merci d'avance pour votre aide !

Cordialement,  



Posted On: June 19, 2024 17:47 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: France
click to apply

item.title: Experienced Video Animator Needed for Explainer Video - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an experienced video animator who can bring our text outline to life by creating an engaging explainer video.

This will be relatively simple explainer video and all the text is already written. I already have a style guide with colors and fonts.

The video will be used to introduce our product and highlight its key features. Your responsibilities will include creating the storyboard, designing the characters, animating the video, and adding appropriate background music and sound effects. The ideal candidate should have a strong portfolio showcasing their previous work in video animation and a solid understanding of storytelling techniques.
  Skills required:
  - Video animation
  - Storyboarding
  - Character design
  - Motion graphics
  - Sound design
  
  This is a medium-sized project that is expected to be completed within 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an expert in video animation who can deliver high-quality work within the given timeframe.

Budget: $300
Posted On: June 19, 2024 17:28 UTC
Category: Cartoons & Comics
Skills:2D Animation, Motion Graphics, Animation, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: 2D Animation, Motion Graphics, Animation, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects

item.title: Video Pickup Shot of USBC Lightning Port in Car (NEED TODAY) - Upwork
item.description:
Hi there,

We're looking for something specific, so please read this post carefully before applying. Generic applications will be reported.

We're in the final stages of producing installation videos for a client and need one or two pickup shots that our team can't get right now.

We need a shot of a USC-C Lightning Port in a vehicle, likely in the center console. It's IMPORTANT that the Lightning Bolt symbol is visible.

We'd like a static shot of the port and a shot of a black USB C cable being plugged into it.

We need the clips today. If someone can deliver (see qualifications below), we'll pay you immediately. It should only take 15-20 minutes of your time.

To qualify, you can either:

A) Shoot the clips and send them to us on Upwork. If we like them, we'll pay you right away. They can be watermarked at first if you're worried about not getting paid.

B) Send us a cell phone image of the USB Port you plan to use and some of your work so we can trust you to get quality footage.

Thanks in advance!

CJ


Budget: $200
Posted On: June 19, 2024 17:22 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:MOV, Cinematography, Video Production, Videography
Skills: MOV, Cinematography, Video Production, Videography
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Producer Needed for Identity Verification Videos with Actress - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced video producer to create and deliver two short videos for our identity verification process. The videos will be used in a digital environment and should adhere to specific technical requirements.

Responsibilities
Source and propose potential actresses for the video, providing us with options to select from.
Coordinate with the chosen actress to produce two videos:
Video 1 (3 seconds): The actress should be filmed placing an ID beside their face while looking at the camera.
Video 2 (3 seconds): The actress should be filmed bringing the ID to the front of the camera.
We require the actress signs a waiver declaration allowing unrestricted use of the videos in our verification flow.

Budget: $500
Posted On: June 19, 2024 17:23 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Video Editing
Skills: Video Production, Video Editing
Country: Canada

item.title: Product Photographer for Dietary Supplement Video - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and experienced product photographer to capture high-quality raw video footage of our dietary supplement product. The focus will be on the product bottle, dropper, and the process of the liquid being dropped into a glass of water and dissolving.

Responsibilities:
- Receive and handle our dietary supplement product.
- Create raw video footage featuring:
  - Close-up shots of the product bottle and dropper.
  - The process of dropping the liquid from the dropper into a glass of water.
  - The liquid dissolving into the water.
- Ensure the footage is shot in a professional studio setting with excellent lighting and clarity.

Requirements:
- Proven experience in product photography and videography.
- Access to a professional studio.
- Ability to capture high-quality, detailed video footage.
- Attention to detail to ensure the product is showcased effectively.
- Ability to deliver the raw footage in a high-resolution format.

Deliverables:
- High-quality raw video footage of the product, dropper, and bottle.
- Clear footage of the liquid being dropped into a glass of water and dissolving.
- The raw footage should be in a format suitable for further editing.

Additional Information:
- We will send you the product for the video shoot.
- Please include examples of your previous product photography/videography work with your application.


Posted On: June 19, 2024 17:18 UTC
Category: Product Photography
Skills:Indoor Location Photography, Studio Photography, White Background Photography, Product Photography, Video Production
Skills: Indoor Location Photography, Studio Photography, White Background Photography, Product Photography, Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
